Package org.example.infra.data.base

Class AccountList

java.lang.Object
org.example.infra.data.base.AccountList
All Implemented Interfaces:
CRUD<Account>
public class AccountList extends Object implements CRUD<Account>
In-memory data store for Account objects using a List collection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    create(Account account)
    Creates a new Account object, assigns a unique account number based on the current list size, prints the account information to the console, and adds it to the internal list.
    void
    delete(Account account)
    Removes an Account object from the internal list.
    List<Account>
    findAll()
    Retrieves and returns a copy of the entire list containing all Account objects.

    getInstance()
    Retrieves the singleton instance of AccountList.

    Reads and retrieves an Account object from the internal list based on the provided account number (id).

    update(Account newAccount, Account key)
    Not currently implemented for this in-memory data store.

      public void create(Account account)
      Creates a new Account object, assigns a unique account number based on the current list size, prints the account information to the console, and adds it to the internal list.

    • read

      public Account read(Integer id)
      Reads and retrieves an Account object from the internal list based on the provided account number (id). Utilizes streams for potentially more concise filtering.
      Specified by:
      read in interface CRUD<Account>
      Parameters:
      id - The account number (id) to identify the target Account object.
      Returns:
      The Account object matching the provided id, or null if not found.

    • update

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      key - The Account object to be used as the update target (placeholder for now).

    • findAll

      public List<Account> findAll()
      Retrieves and returns a copy of the entire list containing all Account objects.
      Specified by:
